review_text:
We’ve visited Georgia and it’s a cuisine that brings special memories back to us. We’ve been to nine other Georgian restaurants and bakeries around the U.S. — and Oda House is the best we’ve had so far!

The quality of the Khinkali (lamb soup dumplings) was much better than others we’ve had. The Khachpuri was incredible (iykyk that Imeruli is even better tasting than the IG trend egg boat Adjaruli) — a pro tip is to help balance the heaviness with their pickles side and ask for ajika (a peppery sauce that is great - it’s not on the menu but should be!). The only thing that could have made the meal even more perfect would be to have Churchkhela available to-go!

Thanks to the team for a special meal and while there are quite a few other Georgian places in NYC, definitely go here and you won’t regret it!
owner_response: Zach, thank you for your wonderful review! We're honored to know that our Georgian cuisine brought back special memories and that Oda House stood out among other restaurants you've visited. Your kind words about our khinkali, khachapuri, and service mean a lot to us. We hope to welcome you back soon to our Georgian restaurant in Manhattan!

review_text: The food here is not good.  I had the gnocchi with pomodoro (one of the few vegetarian options on the menu).  It was luke warm and horrible. Given the quality of the food, the prices were absurd. Addendum: After my initial bad review the owner responded and said the wait staff stopped by the table twice and we told him the food was good.  That is categorically not true.  No one stopped by to ask how the meal was.
owner_response: Hello William, thank you for being our customer. We appreciate your business. Our chef prepares Gnocchi every morning, and also our Pomodoro sauce.  We use the best, and freshest ingredients. It is a lot of love and time in our Gnocchi Pomodoro. If you don't like it please let us know right away so we can take of you. We asked a few times if everything is to your like, and we got a positive answer. Thank you again. We are looking forward to seeing you soon.

review_text: Finestra on York Avenue is an absolute standout! My wife and I had lunch there and were blown away. The seafood salad was fresh, light, and bursting with flavor, and the cheesecake was pure perfection—creamy and unforgettable. Just as impressive was the service: warm, attentive, and genuinely friendly without ever being rushed. They made us feel right at home. Between the food, atmosphere, and outstanding service, Finestra is easily one of the best dining experiences in Manhattan. We can’t wait to come back!
owner_response: Dear Luis, thank you for being our customer. We appreciate your business, and we are looking forward to seeing you again. Thank you for your 5 star review. Best regards, Simona and Finestra team.

review_text: I am so happy I found this restaurant. Every time I go to the hospital I have lunch here. The food is amazing. I love my pasta al dente and Finestra chef does a great job. Last time I had penne vodka and my girlfriend had salmon. Our waiter was very professional and he remembered our drinks from last visit. Penne vodka was delicious. My girlfriend loved her salmon. For dessert we had their amazing Tiramisu. I looking forward to eating at Finestra again.
owner_response: Dear Alexandru, thank you for being our customer. We appreciate your business and we are looking forward to seeing you again.

review_text: Food was literally disgusting, I got penne Alla vodka and it seemed like it could be canned raos sauce with undercooked penne. Also the lunch specials were only $1 less than the dinner specials.
owner_response:
Hi Zora. Thank you for being our customer. Please let us know 
right away if you don't enjoy your food. We ask a few times during the service if everything is good. Penne vodka is a very popular dish and for over 27 years of business thousands of people enjoy it. We are looking forward to seeing you again. Best regards, Finestra team.

review_text: The food service and drinks were all amazing. I love the pasta Alfredo I love everything about this restaurant! The owner is very nice the servers are very attentive would recommend to anyone around the area!!!

review_text: This restaurant was amazing, my soup was incredible and the pasta my wife got was even better and loved the autentic european bread! The staff was very nice and welcoming and made you feel cherished as a customer. This is truly a gem of a place!

review_text:
A rare smallish and quiet NYC restaurant.
Detailed menu with 6 or 7 courses available. Interesting cocktails but no draft beers.
Service polite and efficient. One sidewalk table when we were there.
Bronzino over risotto with vegetables was moist and fresh. Orange gelato very Italian.
Bella mangia!

review_text: Visiting NYC for a meeting and got a treat by my host. This is a gem of a place and staff is so friendly and attentive, has a cosy atmosphere. Nice wine list, we had white Sangria, Pinot Grigio and a Red. The appetizers like the clams, calamari, mussels, eggplant cannelloni were delicious and fresh, not over cooked. My risotto was tasty but I prefer more Al Dente (just personal preference) and creamy, the others had pasta and fish. Pistachio gelato was fantastic, we even got a complimentary Limoncello from the host !
owner_response: Dear Mommy, thank you for being our customer, and thank you for your feedback. We appreciate your business, and we are looking forward to seeing you again. Best regards, Simona and Finestra team

review_text: I placed an order to go for my office team to go and the food was AMAZING! I felt like I was in Italy again! Once I entered the restaurant I was immediately greeted and felt welcomed. My concern was the wait time since they were busy but the order came out fast. I give them a 10 out of 10! Love local establishments that are welcoming and provide exceptional service!
owner_response: Hi Victor, thank you for being our customer. We appreciate your business and we are looking forward to your next order. See you at Upkeep. Best regards, Simona

review_text: What an amazing experience! The food was incredibly tasty – every dish was full of flavor and beautifully presented. The drinks were just as impressive, with a great selection and perfect execution. But what truly made the evening special was the atmosphere: cozy, vibrant, and full of positive energy. The staff was friendly and attentive, making us feel right at home. I can’t wait to come back – this place is an absolute gem!

Stumbled upon this gem of a restaurant and I’m so glad I did. The atmosphere is cozy and welcoming, the kind of place where you instantly feel at ease. The food? Absolutely delicious — fresh ingredients, thoughtful flavors, and beautifully presented.

What stood out even more was the clear attention to detail and passion behind everything — from the menu to the service. It’s obvious that the owners have poured their heart into this place, and it truly shows. Their hard work and vision have created something special, and they deserve real credit for that.

Great food, warm vibes, and a team that genuinely cares. Can’t wait to come back!

Came here while my dad was in the hospital down the street because it was close - loved that its a family owned place and the restaurant inside is inviting/ cool. However, it was slow and service was pleasant but inattentive. Food was mediocre at best. Had the penne vodka with chicken and linguine bolognese. Not worth it.

review_text: Le Moulin a Cafe, cute french bistro , serves various variety of pastry and macarons and serves wonderful brunch menu croque madame was delicious and fried egg hit the palette with a side of salad and vinaigrette balanced the becemel. Also Le burger Du moulin( sirloin burger)cooked as requested with side of fries and Earl gray tea. If your in the area give this cafe a try, your palette won't disappoint.

It is a cute cafe with a nice interior and lots of space at the back. The food is decent but not exceptional. I have had way better croissants. The price is rather high for this type of brunch restaurant and I can think of many other places in UES that I would rather go.
Excellent pastries and light fare. A great place to grab a quick bite. I loved their almond cake - just melts in the mouth.

This is a wonderful little French restaurant. Up front is a cafe with excellent coffee and classic french pastries. In the back a deceptively large dinning area with a cozy inviting atmosphere. The fireplace gives the feel that you're eating in someone's home and it's quite inviting. The food is always excellent, delicious french fare that is always plated beautifully. A great place to have a taste of France.
Absolutely lovely spot with delicious food, quiet outdoor seating and super nice staff.
Went for lunch with a friend. We both had salads which were good. Service was very good. We sat outside- the seating was ok but could be improved- seating was just so so comfortable. Will return.

Truly some of the nicest staff in NYC - their menu is GREAT and they have a verity of vegetarian options for us no-meat people. The omelet was VERY fresh. We happen to be sitting and enjoying our meal when an elderly woman (on her way to dine at the cafe) had fallen and 4 of the staff ran to help her. They were really kind (which should always be the case). One of the waitresses, Iris, was so kind she even gave me two macarons for assisting in the matter- and WOW they were incredible. I'll definitely be back.

update : great place BUT the tatin is not a tatin, they appear to cut corners by using  industrial premade puff pastry and peach in syrup .... very very disappointing. The quiche and salad on the other hand were delicious. Note to management: go all the way french and use Malongo coffee !!!!

stopped there the other day for well deserved hydration break on our 27 miles walk. Busy yet fast service, helpful staff. Good amount of options. Too bad they don’t have Malongo coffee, amazing coffee from south of France. I’d also add some desserts containing creme de marrons, a much better alternative compared to italian nutella. I love french food and I’m expecting french ingredients or french inspired ingredients in a french place. Oooo and add some picon and gambetta syrup if you can too. will definitely come back

Love the food here but I showed up today with my mom and 3 month old daughter and they had an entirely open patio but weren’t willing to accommodate our stroller. Super disappointed since we love the brunch here but now will
Most likely not be returning.
Fast friendly service, a little bit pricey for an omelette, nice outdoor seating, but delicious and would return! no laptop policy

I have seen many bad reviews about the staff. I have not had any bad experiences with the staff because i didn't have special requests, but i see they don't take allergies seriously. However, they have wonderful food and many authentic french treats. They are slightly overpriced; some might think it's worth it, others not.

Beautiful restaurant and bakery. I tried their croissant and tiramisu, and both of them were excellent. I would come back just for that. They also have a lot of French items that can be purchased. The staff was very kind as well. Worth a stop.
All is good except for the fact you can't just have a cup of coffee,  you have to order something from the menu.

The menu choices at this place are clean, healthy (mostly!), and delicious, and the presentation is good. The main dining area has a skylight, which means it feels airy and light like a French cafe should. It can be a bit loud when it is full, but the food is too beautiful to interrupt with much conversation, anyway! (Getting quiche and pastries to go is also a tasty (and speedy) option.)
Had breakfast here that was delicious, really enjoyed my croissant bacon and egg sandwich but the prices were way too high. Cannot justify the prices
Good place, good food, nice people
The best lava cake I’ve ever had

One of the nicer cafes on the paper East. They have a large dining space at the back.
We came on a Saturday morning and the place was packed. Still they found us a table. I ordered an omelette that came with a salad and fries. It was delicious.
I didn't give it a 5 stars because the host indicated our whole group was present before being sitted we had an elderly woman, I'm disabled and we told them our third group member was just parking the car. Still we had to stand and wait for 10 minutes. Not very service oriented of them or sensitive.

The waiter was rude and when we asked him about buttering a croissant, he said they are too busy to do that.  We also asked for them to cut the croissant in half and they were not thrilled about that as well.  They failed to come back to check on us to see how we were doing. I was so disappointed, and I have been here before.  I like convenience of this location, but they really need to improve their people skills.
Excellent accueil, j’adore l’endroit frenchy adorable!
review_text_translated: Excellent welcome, I love the adorable Frenchy place!

review_text: Almost every time I've been I've experienced rude staff.

Been coming here for awhile.  Food is good.  The restaurant design is nice.  The waiter fellow who was working outside tables Saturday afternoon was abrasive enough that it detracted from the meal.  Going forward, if we can’t get a table without him, will take a pass.  The rating would have been 4 or 5 without this guy.
Cute little French authentic café with really good food for croissants are amazing
The French touch in New York city. Love it. Addicted to it.
Quaint and chill cafe to enjoy a morning coffee or breakfast
We’ve eaten here many times, and it’s always excellent. Jamara is very nice and efficient.

I’d love to give this place five stars because there’s clearly been a lot of care go into crafting a lovely space, but as spacious, clean and comfortable as it is, I was disappointed by two things today.
One is, please do not charge $13 for a “fruit plate” with only melon and a couple of grapes. Honestly.
The second thing was the attitude of our server, Alberto. He was very pushy, rather rude and made us feel like we weren’t able to relax, frankly ruining our experience.
Le Moulin is a delightful spot for sweet & savory snacks (good sandwiches and pastries).
I just had croissant de moulin there and my stomach did not feel good right after the meal. Would not recommend…
Great coffee, fresh OJ, delicious quiche.
It is one of my favorite neighborhood cafés. It feels like being in Europe again. I don’t feel rushed like in bagel cafés.
Nice neighborhood vibe. Great quiche and mini baguette.
Stopped in and had a Delicious cup of coffee. Great warm”Frenchy”  atmosphere and friendly staff. Fresh and tasty. I will definitely re visit!

The best burgers in NYC!
Service was amazing, burgers were insanely good, and vibes were spectacular.
Love this place. Best quality, great staff !!

Stumbled into this spot with my fiancée while looking for a bite to eat. Nice cozy spot tucked almost in the corner. They are very nice and friendly and even allowed us to sample their new Fruity Pebbles shake. I ordered the Envy and my Fiancée got the temptation with Cajun fries. My oh my, the fries were not only seasoned to perfection but were a deep golden brown, and left a satisfying crunch after each and every bite. The burgers were also fantastic. I’m no expert, but the burger was fresh, perfectly seasoned, and tender. It was like biting into a pillow of greasy goodness. Nonetheless this place was a great place to cap off a great night.
Genuinely the best burger I ever had. Best service I ever had in NYC and I been living here my whole life.
It was really good burger and great hospitality
Food is good and good customer service
I wish Mr.Nick would’ve given me more attention haha but he told me next time 🤞❤️ Sin City Forevrt!
Great burgers and milkshakes! Highly recommend this spot that’s open till late!
One of the better bugers I ever had. Highly recommended!
Temptation burger is solid. Outdoor seating during warm months. Chill vibe.
Delish! Was craving a burger, and was able to get a gluten free bun. Very friendly staff as well!
One of the best burgers I’ve had in the city, shout out to Nick!
The best and Clean
the best burger ever in my 23years life.

Never again.

Ordered the blue stilton burger, with cajun fries, last night. Sleep about 2 hours last night, and my stomach is not good....

I think I have light food poisoning.
owner_response: Hi Chris, yikes! That’s a rough break. where did you order from? We don’t offer a blue Stilton burger so must be from another restaurant.

review_text: All praise goes to Nick, the manager on the evening of our order. Door Dash never picked up the order for delivery, but Nick delivered it himself after closing the shop for the night.  Above and beyond customer service. Thank you, Nick!

If you’re in New York City and craving a burger, you absolutely have to check out Sin City Burger. I went on Friday and it was hands-down one of the best burger experiences I’ve had in years. The meat was perfection—juicy, tender, and literally melted in my mouth. It was cooked to absolute perfection.

On top of the incredible food, the service made the whole experience even better. Nick, the staff member who helped me, was so pleasant, funny, and easy-going. He really added a personal touch that made the visit memorable.

I can’t recommend this place enough. Sin City Burger is easily one of the best burger joints in NYC right now, and I’ll be telling everyone I know to stop by. A true gem!
insanely delicious pulled pork bbq sliders, owner with great music taste, friendly atmosphere and all around unbeatable vibes. Tysm

I tried Sin City Burger recently and the food was really good. The burgers were juicy, flavorful, and cooked just right. The toppings were fresh, and the fries were crispy and hot. The service was quick and friendly, which made the meal even better. Overall, it’s definitely a spot I’d come back to when I’m craving a good burger.
From Louisiana and the food was delicious. It's a small place, but great place to eat.

Listen, as a NYC native (born and raised) lemme tell you this is probably, if not, the best burger i’ve had in my life! Tell shake shack, 7th street, and five guys to move over, there’s a new burger joint in town 😈
The chef Nicholas was amazing . Wings are worth it and the vibes and atmosphere are good . Me and the boys ate good .

The food was fine, but I couldn’t get past seeing staff smoking outside and then going straight back in without washing their hands. Basic hygiene should be a priority, and it made me lose my appetite.
I really hate to write this review, as I have had good experiences in the past. However, when I  ordered a chicken sandwich parts of the chicken were raw. Unfortunately, I will not be going back
owner_response:
Hi Hans,

We’re truly sorry to hear about your recent experience. Serving undercooked food is unacceptable and not up to our standards, and we take this very seriously. We appreciate you sharing this feedback as it helps us address the issue right away with our team.

We’d love the chance to make this right for you. Please reach out to us directly at sincityburger@gmail.com so we can follow up personally.

Thank you again for your past support, and we hope you’ll give us another opportunity to provide the experience you expect.

review_text: Fantastic burger (patty was full of flavor and juicy), great friendly service, came 5600 miles from Middle East from the other Sin City burger place, 100% recommended.
Excellent juicy burger good value and tasty homemade fries.  Sauce is unique and flavorful.  Good atmosphere and friendly staff. Fun Pac-Man game while you wait
Burgers are amazing every one is super Kind
Temptation burger was amazing. Every ingredient complimented each other. The manager was great really friendly.

Must visit for great burgers! Been here several times and it’s always 10/10. Chef Nick provides great hospitality and also shout out to Angel the line cook. I’m writing this review as I’m on my way for my weekly cheat meal 🙏
Delicious.and quick. You are my New Go To in the hood!
De lekkerste burgers die we al hebben gevonden in NYC

The food is amazing, the fries are bomb and the burgers are fire as always. The guilty burger is my fav!!! Nick was an amazing server too, great customer service & went the extra mile for us. Must come back!!
Amazing beyond burger

helpful and nice service!
Polite and ready to serve

I always have a wonderful interaction when I go to this location. I’m literally addicted to the Brussel sprouts . Every time I’m on shift I get a double order layered in those delicious pickled red onions. I love the guacamole and sweet potatoes as well . When they see they have my order ready . Great all around no complaints from my belly
I ordered a large order and the staff in person and online were very helpful and kind accommodating my requests!

ive been to many dos toros establishments and this one takes the cake by far its food and workers provided me with amazing customer service and top quality food i would definitely recommend and come back damiere mike and matt gave me an amazing time

review_text: The food is amazing and the staff is very kind.
owner_response: Thanks for the review, Jack. Our team is committed to providing the best customer service and quality food. We hope to see you back again soon!

review_text: Muy burn servicio

review_text: Amazing food and customer service
The food hits the spot and the staff is super chill and friendly. Always down for a Dos Toros run 😎🌯

review_text: Management and staff here are personable, friendly, and Real.
Soooo good!
Still the best pastrami in city.  Better than Katz, 2nd Ave deli, or Carnegie. Ridiculously priced (as they all are). Seating is pathetic. But the smell and taste of the pastrami is fantastic.
owner_response: We’re so glad you enjoyed your visit, Bill! Your kind words mean the world to us. Hope to see you again soon for another great experience!

review_text: The pastrami sandwich would be fine, if it only cost $12.  But at $29 out the door, it is comically small and comically bland.
owner_response: Nick, we sincerely apologize for falling short of your expectations with our pastrami sandwich from our scratch kitchen. It's disheartening to learn that the portion size and flavor profile did not meet your standards, as we strive to deliver exceptional quality and value with each of our handcrafted deli sandwiches. We would be grateful if you could reach out to us at contact@pastramiqueen.com to discuss your experience further. We hope you'll consider giving us another opportunity to provide you with a truly satisfying dining experience.

review_text: I visited on Rosh Hashanah for the first time in 20 years. I was disappointed. It was not as I remembered as a child. the food was mediocre at best. The pastrami was very dry, hard and too thick. Not enjoyable at all. The roast beef was flavorless and also very dry. For the prices they charge I’m glad I haven’t visited in 20 years and will likely wait another 20+ years for the next visit.
owner_response: John, we are disheartened to learn that your recent visit to Pastrami Queen did not meet your expectations, particularly on such a significant occasion as Rosh Hashanah. We take great pride in our from-scratch kitchen and the quality of our pastrami and other deli sandwiches. Your feedback regarding the dryness and lack of flavor in the pastrami and roast beef is concerning, and we appreciate you bringing this to our attention. We hope you'll give us another opportunity to provide you with an excellent dining experience that truly showcases our commitment to quality and authenticity.

review_text: their food from the store seems good but their catering food is awful. their brisket is cut way too thin and just disappointing.  stick to the pastrami and knishes, but again catering food for some reason comes from a different place and is just not good.
owner_response: We're disappointed to hear you had an unsatisfactory experience with our catering services, specifically the brisket. We kindly ask that you reach out to us at contact@pastramiqueen.com so we can look into this matter and ensure our catering offerings live up to the Pastrami Queen name. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience; it will help us improve.
Thank you for your rating! We truly appreciate your support and can't wait to have you back soon!

review_text:
Delivered quickly. Everything was exactly as ordered.
Food was delicious. A great take in experience
owner_response: Dean, thank you for your positive review! We're delighted to hear you enjoyed our delicious pastrami sandwiches made from scratch in our kitchen. review_text:
En vrai le pastramie un peu bof comparé a katz sa n'a rien a voir je les trouve bien moin savoureur ici
Seul chose qui me fait mettre 4 étoile c'est les frite qui sont maison et portion tres généreuse pour facilement 2 personnes katz devrait justement en prendre note car c'est se qui leur fait défaut....
Sinom trouve l'accueil moyen seul un employé c'est accueillir les gens sinom on existe pas pour les autres
Niveaux prix c'est comparable a katz j'ai eu pour un sandwich 1 boisson 1 frite ( qui compte pour 2 ) un total de 42$ taxe comprise
En revanche restaurant assez petit si vous 5 ou 6 sa etre un peu compliqué
review_text_translated:
Actually, the pastrami is a bit mediocre compared to Katz, it's nothing like it. I find them much less flavorful here.
The only thing that makes me give it 4 stars is the fries, which are homemade and the portion is very generous for easily 2 people. Katz should take note of this because that's what they're lacking...
Sinom finds the welcome average. Only one employee is there to welcome people. Sinom doesn't exist for others.
Price-wise, it's comparable to Katz. I got a sandwich, 1 drink, and 1 frie (which counts as 2), a total of $42 including tax.
On the other hand, the restaurant is quite small, if there are 5 or 6 of you, it can be a bit complicated.
owner_response: Antonin, we're disappointed to hear that our pastrami didn't fully meet your expectations compared to other delis. We take great pride in our from-scratch kitchen and pastrami sandwiches. We appreciate your kind words about our homemade fries and generous portions. Your feedback helps us continue improving, and we hope you'll give us another opportunity to provide an excellent experience. We'd love to have you back for a special occasion.

review_text:
Lets get right to it: $30 for the sandwich wasn’t worth it. Sandwich wasn’t horrible, a bit dry and had basic flavor but still edible (for $2 a bite of course) I just feel there shouldn’t be reviews or ravings of “known for huge sandwiches”. A huge sandwich should have me full or saving half for later. Im still hungry and Im definitely not a big back. I can appreciate great food for the price but this didn’t add up for me and I work all over the city to queens and brooklyn. Try it and form your own opinion of course but don’t go in with high expectations. I didn’t even have enough dressing to finish the other half of my sandwich.

Ps dont let the photo fool you, sandwich is barely 2 lbs Id say

Hands down one of the best Thai restaurants in the city. Their crab fried rice lava is perfect. Their cocktail selection is surprisingly neat. The "Ferris Wheel" is very balanced and worth of a cocktail you'd find in a high-end cocktail bar. The "Java Clementine" was a fun, well-done take on Negroni with Italicus, but seemed to have been retired.

We visited this place upon the recommendation of a friend. The food is amazing and they are very prompt serving the dishes. The attentive staff refills our water without asking, ensuring we stay hydrated throughout our meal. We particularly enjoyed the Tod Mun Goong, a dish of juicy and crispy shrimp cakes with ground pork. It was so delicious that we’ll definitely return just for that.

Another highlight was the Paloh Hang, a dish of tender meat served with a sweet sauce. It reminded us of Hamonado, a Filipino dish. We also tried the Zabb Hang, a dry rice noodle dish that we found more enjoyable than the Pad Thai.

While the restaurant is very busy, especially during dinner, we recommend making reservations if you’re planning to dine with more than four people. Additionally, they only allow 90 minutes of dining, so be sure to plan accordingly.

Overall, our experience at Paloh Hang was excellent and highly recommended.

I finally made it over to Tha Phraya and have to say — the Ka Prow Beef is the move. Spicy, fragrant, a little smoky, and the kind of heat that sneaks up on you in the best way. The basil cuts through rich beef perfectly, and when you throw it over rice with that runny egg on top, it’s just one of those dishes you don’t want to end.

Plenty of good Thai spots in the city, but this one feels like it has some soul behind it. The Ka Prow Beef alone makes Tha Phraya worth putting on repeat.
Great food and great experience thanks Chris!
The food is amazing! Chris is served our table and he was the best. Would 10/10 recommend!
Amazing! Incredible. The Khao Soi was amazing!!
Pad Ka-Prow and Chicken Khao-Soi were delicious, especially the Chicken Khao-Soi which was rich and savory, I scooped every drop of the soup.
Legit Thai joint. Best Papaya Salad I've found in ages. And a new dish I've never had that is apparently super popular in a specific region (Zaab Hang). Highly recommend.
The food is delicious! We can not wait to visit again.

I arrived when staff had more time. Workers maintained service uniquely excellent. The experience here is consistently exceptional. The meals demonstrate just-prepared components. This restaurant is worth broader exposure.
The food is good and service is good, but the food portion is quite small and the price is a little higher. Still recommend it.
Do not worth the price.
Great food great service.

Great food. I must say it may be among the three top Thai restaurants in NYC. Every dish is deliciously prepared, and the use of spices is perfectly balanced. Service is also very welcoming and attentive. We have eaten here multiple times, and we look forward to discovering new dishes.

this place is absolutely amazing. You won't necessarily find all the same things you find at other Thai restaurants, but whatever you order will be great. They definitely do some unique things. Like using brisket in a curry instead of a traditional type of meat. The staff is incredibly niceand this is one of my favorite places to eat.
Great ambiance and service! I had the vegan green curry which was delicious — my one suggestion would be to add a protein in it, like tofu.
Dinner was so amazing! Ask for Oliver when you come in!!

The curry noodle is creamy, love the coconut milk in the curry. But the chicken is very normal.
Also like the newspaper style menu.

I cannot brag enough about this place! First of all, the menu is SO fun. Its hard to find something this authentic and with really fresh ingredients presented so beautifully 😍 The servers are so thoughtful and kind with EXCELLENT service! We got the appetizer with the Beetle leaves...which honestly was SO good and fresh. Ive never had that before and I was blown away. We got the pomello salad and the sauce on this was delicious! We got a Phuket crab curry to share and asked for medium spice level. Turns out we underestimated our spice tolerance 😅😅. They're not messin around! But the curry was SO delicious we just kept eating and struggling. The server saw us and got us a sweet iced thai tea (without milk because I had expressed not wanting milk in my food earlier) without even asking!!! HOW INCREDIBLY thoughtful 😭
We got rose tea and one of the cocktails for drinks. Both were yummy. The star of the show was the mango sticky rice. This was certainly one of the best we've had in a long time!
This place is SO cute! Even their bathroom decor is supper cute lol. Would highly recommend!

A nice authentic Thai restaurant in the UES.

The place has nice atmosphere and the service is great. The food is delicious and made with fresh ingredients. I love the crispy shrimp cake and the Penang curry, the flavor is tasty and delicious. The only thing I didn’t like it’s the Paloh Hang (pork belly) is a bit too fatty for me.

I would recommend to my friends to come!
Nice atmosphere, nice taste, nice staff

I took my parents here and my dad said "This is the best food I've had in 20 years". This is a coming from a man who NEVER tries any new food. He was literally reaching across the table trying everyones food. I have never seen him act like this- Tha Phraya single handed changed 50 years of his habits.
Dropped in during weekday for lunch. Atmosphere was nice and quiet. Not too crowded. We had Green Curry and Pad Thai and the food was very good. The service was prompt and servers were very nice.

Best Nam Tok noodle in town !!!
I always get Pork Nam tok noodle from them 🩷🩷🩷🩷
if i could give 6 stars i would!!!!

Thank you for amazing service, Mindy!
Wonderful dinner with attentive service from our fabulous server, Mindy. Can’t wait to return.

I booked a dinner reservation for 3 people the same day on Resy to celebrate my cousin's graduation since she picked this restaurant. We were all worried that we wouldn't be full after eating, but I'm happy to say  that after 2 appetizers and 2 entrees that we shared,we were stuffed!! Each dish was flavorful and distinct, and we will be coming back!! The service by Mindy was also wonderful. She came over to ask about allergies at least 3 times, and refilled drinks as needed.
Food was really good, and service was top notch! Mindy really took care of us and ensured we enjoyed our meal!

Tha Phraya is a great spot to try some classic Thai dishes. They have the staple dishes you'd expect to see from a US-based takeout spot, but their menu goes much deeper and has some true classic Thai dishes that are worth exploring. We ordered 3 entree / main dishes and two appetizers for our table of three people, and it was more than enough (and a fun variety). Their cocktail list is solid as well. It's a bit loud and the tables are a bit close together, but overall it's not bad and still a good vibe. Definitely snag a reservation if you can.
Delicious, authentic Thai food. Really enjoyed a beef soup. Great service
Food is average and served warm both hot. It took like 40 min for us to wait for 2 dishes during lunch time and they are not busy during workday noon.

Food portion is quite small. I would recommend Squid fish and beef over rice. Both dishes are flavorful and good quality of the meat. Red curry is a bit too sweet and duck meat inside was a little dry.  And the crab fried rice was also below average in my opinion.
A excellent little gem in NYC !

Great food and great music!
All sandwiches i've tried are super tasty. They have grear specials! Great service, cozy atmosphere. Thei sweers are superb. I higjly recommend this place!
Tiny shop with 8 seats dishing out mouth watering Italian sandwiches.
Only $11 for a Caprese sandwich? Count me in. Extra fresh ingredients, especially the mozzarella. Special seasoning elevates it even more.
Amazing food and service, very clean inside,

Fue una grata sorpresa este pequeño local, los paninis están deliciosos, ingredientes frescos y con sabor, sin duda recomendables. El personal amable, te ayuda explicando todo lo que podrías necesitar para elegir el panini que más se te antoje.
review_text_translated: This little place was a pleasant surprise. The paninis are delicious, with fresh ingredients and flavor, definitely recommended. The friendly staff helps explain everything you need to choose the panini you're craving.

review_text: Nothing like a solid sandwich!!! I appreciate the organic ingredients!
Awesome paninis, super delicious. We didn't expect it to be that good!!
This place is the real deal! Authentic Italian panini, the atmosphere is perfect. Hole in the wall spot with great food options and ingredients that are fresh!
Great selection of sandwiches, both vegetarian and non-vegetarian!
Both Manhattan locations are amazing, petite space to share a meal with a friend  or loved one. Great date night idea! Priced well. Customer service is excellent.
Amazing food, amazing staff, 10/10 would recommend!
Eggplant parm sandwich on focaccia was delicious!!!! Seating area is small and has some flies that could be taken care of. Service was great as well.
Wonderful staff and environment! Food was good!
Love this place
I love coming here and sharing a sandwich with my fiancé, the food is 🤌🏼
They’re actually Italian with Italian DOC imported goods. The space is a bit small and unintuitive , and staff are… well.. Italian. Otherwise, speedy service and quality everything.
Great spot! Highly recommend the Portofino!

Je suis venue manger ici avec une amie, nous sommes françaises et les bons sandwichs français nous manquait un peu, nous avons trouvé cet endroit

un peu petit a l’intérieur peu de places assises, il y a un espace extérieur pour s’asseoir aussi- mais c’est à proximité de central park alors c’est tout aussi bien de prendre à emporter pour manger à l’extérieur !

Les sandwichs sont très garnis et les produits frais et bons ! Je recommande aussi la strawberry limonade !

merci pour le service rapide ! Nous reviendrons
review_text_translated:
I came to eat here with a friend. We're French and we were missing good French sandwiches a little, so we found this place.

It's a bit small inside, with not many seats. There's an outdoor seating area too—but it's close to Central Park, so it's just as good to get takeout and eat outside!

The sandwiches are very filling and the ingredients are fresh and good! I also recommend the strawberry lemonade!

Thank you for the quick service! We'll be back!

review_text: Panineria is our favorite sandwich shop in the neighborhood. We used to live right above them and were honestly sad to leave in part because of this place. Excellent ingredients, super nice people, all you could want.
Very cute sandwich shop in the UES. As soon as you walk in, it smells delicious! Plenty of sandwich and pasta options!
Delicious! Can’t recommend more!
Great food, friendly staff
Sandwich was fresh, great bread. Staff friendly!
Quick service, fun variety of tapas different than traditional (Barcelona) Spanish tapas.

La Atencion de Cataldo fue maravillosa, tan atento, tan amable
Siempre pendiente si necesitábamos algo, incluso sin pedirles, no nos brindaba lo que necesitábamos y la comida es deliciosa. Recomiendo este lugar venimos desde Oxford y está riquísimo los camarones al ajillo picoso el pollo con Red Bell Pepper están deliciosos, además  la burrata es muy rica
Para las personas que les gusta los pico cito, todo fue delicioso
review_text_translated:
Cataldo's service was wonderful, so attentive, so kind.
Always attentive if we needed anything, even without asking, he wouldn't give us what we needed, and the food is delicious. I recommend this place. We came from Oxford and the spicy garlic shrimp and chicken with Red Bell Pepper are delicious, plus the burrata is delicious.
For those who like pico de gallo, everything was delicious.

review_text: Super rica comida, las salsas picosas estaban perfectas, no demasiado picosas pero enchilado rico! Los camarones, burratta, pollo, y paella estuvieron deliciosos!!
review_text_translated: The food was delicious, the spicy sauces were perfect—not too spicy, but delicious! The shrimp, burrata, chicken, and paella were all delicious!!

review_text: This restaurant earned a permanent spot in my rotation. The setting balances neatness with approachability. The value proposition works with generous portions, great taste, and attentive staff. The restaurant personnel give perfect care. You need to form your own opinion.
Great tortilla de patata and sangria! Super friendly staff!!!

i’m from Hawaii and here for work and found this nice little restaurant while walking around. went in I got to meet the owner, Alex and Anthony the cook and Andres who greeted and seated me.
AWESOME service. Very nice people and great food. Alex(owner) recommended Montaditos Venezuela to complement the Seafood Spicy Paella.
Both were really good. Highly recommend paying this place a visit. This 2 dishes filled me up.
I will definitely be coming here whenever I'm in NYC.  If you go there because you read my review please let them know why you came.
Mahalo
Great restaurant with a friendly & personal service
So delicious! Highly recommend!

Waooo this seafood paella with chorizo was incredible, very fresh and soft and in top of that cooked in front of my eyes. Alex keep up the great work, EZ Paella is a winner and a keeper
See you guys again in November.
This food I very flavorful and the staff are amazing!!
Lo mejor que hemos comido de comida latina en NYC.👅💦👅💦
review_text_translated: The best Latin food we've had in NYC.👅💦👅💦

review_text: This is some of the best tapas I’ve had in Manhattan, seriously. Service was incredible and Cataldo was so nice!
owner_response: Gracias

review_text: Great food!
I love this mix between Venezuelan and Spanish food, I recommend it
Great food had a great time
We are a group of four and did tapas. The food was amazing. Everything was flavorful! Will definitely come again

The tapas were delicious! We got a variety and they didn’t disappoint! Our server was great and gave us recommendations. The manager checked in on us and took a pic for us! Definitely come for the food, but stay for the low-key, small hole in the wall vibes.
Amazing service to match the amazing food!!! Will definitely be back!!
Incredible food, wonderful atmosphere, fantastic staff, and the owner is such a great guy!

We decide to try something different as we are still celebrating our anniversary. Its our fist time here and the service was great and the food was delicious!
I had the Montaditos Venezuela and the yuquitas con chimichurri. My fiance had the Pabellón criollo! The music wasn't loud ,very nice place and very clean place including the restroom
Unexpected surprise paella and sangria were awesome.
Food and Sangria was phenomenal. Wonderful dinner. Thank you!
Delicious food, exquisite meatballs, their spicy flavor, uff
Great Paella and service.
Continúa siendo la mejor paella y Tapas en Nueva York. Excelente Ambiente y comida. Loved 😍 it
review_text_translated: It's still the best paella and tapas in New York. Excellent atmosphere and food. Loved it 😍
owner_response: Thank you for your kind words! We're thrilled you enjoyed your paella at EZ Paella.

review_text:
—The whole experience was mediocre. 🫩 We ordered tapas / ham & cheese croquettes which were salty and the flavor did not hit. We also had the morsillas that looked appealing but were bland , lacked flavor and were not savory at all, also a disappointment.  For the entree we were excited to order the signature paella, that people so rave about.  The paella was an interesting one , it was not super bad but also the flavors did not wow me , it did have great amount of fresh seafood but rice was lil too heavy .  Overall this place did not impress me at all . Definitely overrated, meals were mediocre with flavors that were completely off. Seasoning was not good!  👎🏽👎🏽

—I had the ‘Tres Leche cake for dessert which was pretty good.
Awesome appetizers! Tres Leches is out of this world.
great place for tapas!
Exelente la comida el servicio
review_text_translated: Excellent food and service

review_text: They offer both vegetarian and gluten-free options, marked on the menu. It is a fairly small spot, but the inside is clean, with a nice ambience. Can be a bit expensive for what you get, but it is right in the theater district, so its expected. But a great spot for a quick meal.
Best paella we’ve ever had! The service is great!
Fantastic food, service, true nyc atmosphere! Food is real Venezuela-Spanish cuisine! You should go enjoy
delicious food & really great service!! highly recommend
Food was so so good! Service was even better, everyone was very friendly and we were seated right away. If your find yourselves in Hell’s Kitchen, drop by EZ Paella and have a great time!

This place offers some of the best prepared Spanish and Venezuelan dishes you can have in NYC. No joke. We've ordered pretty much the entire tapas menu and everything was made or cooked to perfection. Big thumbs up to our waiter who had to deal with a big party which came with us. I highly recommend this establishment when it comes to authenticity of the two cuisines I've mentioned.
Quick service, fun variety of tapas different than traditional (Barcelona) Spanish tapas.

La Atencion de Cataldo fue maravillosa, tan atento, tan amable
Siempre pendiente si necesitábamos algo, incluso sin pedirles, no nos brindaba lo que necesitábamos y la comida es deliciosa. Recomiendo este lugar venimos desde Oxford y está riquísimo los camarones al ajillo picoso el pollo con Red Bell Pepper están deliciosos, además  la burrata es muy rica

Buena Vista Restaurant & Bar never disappoints! The food is full of flavor, the drinks are great, and the service is always friendly. The space has a fun, relaxed vibe that’s perfect for hanging out with friends or enjoying a nice meal. Everything feels easy and welcoming — definitely a spot you’ll want to come back to.
owner_response: ¡Muchas gracias, Queen B! Apreciamos tu feedback y estamos encantados de que disfrutes de tu experiencia con nosotros. ¡Esperamos verte de nuevo pronto!

review_text: Everything was fabulous!
owner_response: Thanks, Anne! 🤩 We're so glad you had a fab time with us! Come back soon! 🌟

review_text: Lovely spot before the theatre for some delicious food. Large portions, Latin combinations & nice eclectic feel.
owner_response: Thank you for your wonderful feedback! We're thrilled you enjoyed our delicious offerings and ambiance—your support inspires us to keep delivering exceptional food experiences.

review_text: Comida deliciosa, auténticamente latinoamericana. La atención es increíble, hubo un detalle con el orden de los alimentos y lo compensaron de muy buena manera.
review_text_translated: Delicious, authentic Latin American food. The service is incredible. There was a thoughtful touch with the order of the food, and they made up for it in a very good way.
owner_response: Gracias, María Dolores, por tus amables palabras. Nos encanta saber que valoras nuestra atención y estamos comprometidos a mejorar siempre. ¡Esperamos verte pronto!
Gracias, Gerardo! Nos alegra saber que tu experiencia fue excelente y valoramos mucho tu apoyo.
Hey Nilda! 🎉 Thanks for the awesome 5-star love! You're officially part of our cool crew! 🌟
I'm sorry to hear about your experience, Nina. We truly value your feedback and would love the opportunity to make things right—please reach out to us directly so we can address your concerns.

review_text: I truly enjoyed the food, and every detail in the presentation was a delightful experience. Krystal was an outstanding waitress, always attentive and offering the best recommendations. Thanks to her, I left with a wonderful memory of this place. I will certainly return on my next trip to New York
owner_response: Thank you, Katherine, for your wonderful feedback! We're thrilled to hear you enjoyed the food and found Krystal's service exceptional—your satisfaction is our top priority, and we look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to New York!

review_text: Food was really good
owner_response: Thank you, Caelen, for your wonderful feedback! We're thrilled to hear you enjoyed the food and look forward to serving you again soon.
Thanks a ton, Thomas! 🌟 You're officially part of the cool club! 🎉

review_text: I'm a persistent patron.
owner_response: Cảm ơn bạn đã tin tưởng và trở thành một khách hàng trung thành! Chúng tôi trân trọng phản hồi của bạn và sẽ tiếp tục cải thiện để phục vụ bạn tốt hơn.

review_text: Crystal was an amazing server. She knew the menu and helped us make some great choices. Everything we ate was DELICIOUS!!!

Excelente calidad del servicio, muchas gracias a Krystel por su atención, muy especial.
Venir a NY y visitarlos fue una experiencia inolvidable.
review_text_translated:
Excellent service. Many thanks to Krystel for her very special attention.
Coming to NY and visiting them was an unforgettable experience.
owner_response: ¡Hola Rogelio! 🎉 Gracias por tus palabras tan lindas, nos alegra saber que Krystel hizo tu visita memorable. ¡Te esperamos de vuelta en el paraíso neoyorquino! 🌆✨

review_text: La comida súper rica y la atención de Krystell maravillosa, vine a celebrar mi cumple y me hizo sentir especial
review_text_translated: The food was super delicious and Krystell's attention was wonderful. I came to celebrate my birthday and she made me feel special.
owner_response: Estimada Tania, ¡muchas gracias por compartir tus amables palabras! Nos alegra saber que disfrutaste de tu comida y que Krystell contribuyó a hacer de tu cumpleaños una celebración especial.

review_text:
We went here for a brunch on Sunday.
The food was amazing and the staff was were kind and professional. Our experience was super! Thank you!
owner_response: Dear Rossella, thank you for your wonderful feedback! We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed our brunch and experienced our team's professionalism; we look forward to welcoming you back soon!

review_text: Delicious food and cocktails. The service is excellent. Enjoyed the paella, guacamole and chips, and an amazing appetizer with quail eggs 🤤
owner_response: Thanks, Michele! 🎉 We're thrilled you loved your meal and cocktails! Come back soon for more tasty adventures! 🍹✨

review_text:
The food was excellent. Tasty and not overwhelmingly flavorful --- worked well for me. Nice presentation was a bonus.

Note that tip (though I didn't look at the percentage) was already included in the check even for only two people. And then the machine provided suggestions for 3%, 5%, and 7% additional tip. I didn't have an issue with that -- just an fyi.
owner_response: Thank you for your fantastic feedback, Giang! We're thrilled you enjoyed your meal and appreciate your insights about the tipping process.

review_text: Delicious, very attentive service and original food
owner_response: Thank you, Matthieu! We're thrilled to hear you enjoyed our food and service—your feedback keeps us motivated to innovate and excel!

review_text: Food is very good, service is great thank you Cathy will most definitely Vist you again.
owner_response: Hey Flaco Man! 🎉 So pumped you loved the food and service! Can't wait to have you back for round two! 🍽️✨

review_text: I was there on Tuesday. The food was delicious, and the mussels were my favorite appetizer. Argentine beef was my favorite main course. The service was excellent. Krystal was our waitress, and she was lovely. She recommended the best dishes! If you go, ask for her!
owner_response: Thank you, Tamara, for your wonderful feedback! We're delighted to hear you enjoyed our food and service, especially Krystal's recommendations—your satisfaction is our top priority, and we look forward to welcoming you back!

review_text: Local muito agradável, ambiente sofisticado, com um ótimo atendimento. Os pratos vieram rapidamente, sendo deliciosos. Recomendo.
review_text_translated: A very pleasant place with a sophisticated atmosphere and excellent service. The dishes arrived quickly and were delicious. I recommend it.
owner_response: Agradecemos sinceramente, Celso, por suas amáveis palavras sobre nosso ambiente e atendimento. Sua recomendação é muito apreciada e nos motiva a continuar oferecendo experiências excepcionais.

review_text: Incredible experience for my first visit at the restaurant, the services was impeccable and the food was amazing. I’ll see you guys again
owner_response: Thank you, Olando! We're thrilled you enjoyed your first visit and can't wait to serve you again soon!
Hey Sergey! 🎉 Thanks for the awesome 5-star love! You're officially in the cool crowd! 😎✨

review_text: Food, service- everything was so amazing. Crystal was fantastic. Thank you!
owner_response: Thank you, Renee! We're thrilled to hear you had an amazing experience with us and appreciate your kind words about Crystal.

review_text:
Fantastic cuisine with 5 star service.
The Cuban tamales and octopus were outstanding.  Even if you are stuffed, don’t leave without sharing the tres leche cake.   We will be back very soon.
owner_response: Thank you, Billy! We're thrilled to hear you enjoyed our cuisine and service, and we can't wait to welcome you back for more delicious experiences!
Hey Marlene! 🌟 Thanks a million for the stellar review! You totally rock! 🎉

review_text: Exelente servicio Mikalela es muy linda y atenta. La comida riquísima. Amigable para personas con necesidades especiales!
review_text_translated: Excellent service. Mikalela is very nice and attentive. The food is delicious. Special needs-friendly!
owner_response: Estimada Lourdes, gracias por sus amables palabras sobre Mikalela y nuestro servicio. Nos alegra saber que disfrutó de la comida y que nuestro espacio es accesible para todos; su satisfacción es nuestra prioridad.
Hey Juliana! 🌟 Thanks for the love! We’re so glad you had an awesome time with us! 🎉

review_text: Tiny New York restaurant with big impact!  Artfully served, tasty dishes served attentively.  Highly recommend!  Thank you, Meka for a wonderful experience.
owner_response: Merci, Adrien! We’re thrilled to hear you enjoyed your experience and appreciate your kind words—your feedback inspires us to keep improving!

review_text: What a great start, we were welcomed by Steve who escorted us into a nice and pleasant space, great ambiance.  Our waitress, Micaela was sweet and very attentive, the pork chop and skirt steak was perfect, and the guava basil margarita was absolutely delicious!  Our server, John from beautiful Ecuador was on point, and the banana bread topped with vanilla ice cream was the topping on a beautiful evening.  We'll be back and we're recommending this great place to our friends and family!
owner_response: Thank you, Helen! We’re thrilled to hear you had such a wonderful experience and appreciate your recommendations. Your feedback inspires us to keep improving!

review_text: One of the best restaurant experiences! Our waitress, Micaela, was super friendly, attentive, and made us feel very welcome. The food was delicious; my lobster ravioli was wonderful, as were the cocktails, appetizers, and dessert. They have a very pleasant and welcoming atmosphere. The manager was also very kind. I recommend going, and if you go, ask for Micaela as your waitress; you won't regret it. We will definitely return!
owner_response: Hey Valeria! 🎉 So pumped you had a blast with us and Micaela! Can’t wait to see you back for more deliciousness! 🍝🍹✨

review_text: Dinner was delicious, service was attentive and friendly.  Our server, Micah was great!  We started with the Tamal and hanger cured pork tenderloin with the sunny side quail egg.  Both were delicious, the hanger cured pork was unique.  For our entrees, the duck was perfectly cooked as suggested by the chef.  The skirt steak was very tender, nice portion.  Cute place, definitely will come back to try other dishes on the menu.
owner_response: Dear Sue, thank you for your wonderful feedback! We're thrilled to hear you enjoyed your dinner and service, especially Micah’s attentiveness; we look forward to welcoming you back for more delicious dishes soon!

review_text: Their cooking showed attention to proper technique. Their servers help efficiently, and their food tastes fresh and delicious. Their staff steps in at just the right moment. All items provide taste satisfaction. I discovered this inviting spot via internet recommendations.
owner_response: Dear Stewart Manson, thank you for your wonderful review! We are thrilled to hear that you appreciated our attention to detail and enjoyed your experience; we look forward to welcoming you back soon!

review_text:
**Reseña: Buena Vista - Sabores que Resaltan y una que Otra Sorpresa (para el Paladar Boricua)**

¡Saludos, gente de buen diente y paladar exigente! Recientemente me di la vuelta por Buena Vista y, como buenos puertorriqueños que somos, siempre andamos buscando esa chispa que nos haga decir "¡epa, esto está brutal!". Aquí les va mi veredicto, pensando en esos gustos que no se conforman con menos.

Empezamos fuerte con el **Pulpo a la Parrilla**, y déjenme decirles que este plato es un acierto. El pulpo estaba en su punto, tierno por dentro y con ese toque ahumado de la parrilla que tanto nos gusta. Una ejecución que respeta el producto y lo eleva.

Luego le dimos la oportunidad al **Pork Chop** y al **Rib Eye**. Ambos cortes de carne estaban a la altura. El Pork Chop jugoso y con buen sabor, y el Rib Eye con esa grasa infiltrada que le da el gusto que esperamos. Si eres de los que disfrutan una buena carne, aquí no te vas a sentir defraudado.

Pero la verdadera estrella de los especiales fue el **Sea Bass Ceviche**. ¡Qué cosa más sabrosa! Fresco, con el balance perfecto de acidez y ese toque cítrico que te despierta el paladar. Definitivamente, este ceviche tiene el "flow" y el gusto que buscamos en un buen plato de mariscos.

Ahora, no todo fue color de rosa. Y es que, con la misma honestidad que alabamos lo bueno, tenemos que señalar lo que no cuadra. Las **Empanadas de Pollo** fueron el único plato que, honestamente, no nos gustó ni un poquito. Aquí hay que hacer un *mea culpa* y o las sacan del menú, o le dan un giro de 180 grados a la receta. No tienen ni la sazón ni la textura que esperaríamos; se sienten fuera de lugar en una cocina que, por lo demás, tiene platos tan bien logrados.

En resumen, [Nombre del Restaurante] tiene mucho potencial y platos que realmente valen la pena probar, especialmente si te inclinas por los mariscos y las carnes. Pero, por favor, ¡a revisar esas empanadas! Para los que tenemos un paladar educado y sabemos cuándo algo está bien hecho, hay opciones excelentes que demuestran que en esta cocina hay talento.
review_text_translated:
**Review: Buena Vista - Flavors That Stand Out and a Surprise Here and There (for the Puerto Rican Palate)**

Greetings, people with good taste and discerning palates! I recently stopped by Buena Vista and, like the good Puerto Ricans that we are, we're always looking for that spark that makes us say "Wow, this is awesome!" Here's my verdict, thinking about those tastes that don't settle for less.

We started strong with the **Grilled Octopus**, and let me tell you, this dish is a success. The octopus was cooked to perfection, tender on the inside, and with that smoky touch from the grill that we love so much. An execution that respects the product and elevates it.

Then we gave the **Pork Chop** and the **Rib Eye** a try. Both cuts of meat were up to par. The Pork Chop was juicy and flavorful, and the Rib Eye had that infiltrated fat that gives it the taste we expect. If you're someone who enjoys good meat, you won't be disappointed here.

But the real star of the specials was the **Sea Bass Ceviche**. What a flavor! Fresh, with the perfect balance of acidity and that citrus touch that awakens your palate. This ceviche definitely has the flow and flavor we look for in a good seafood dish.

Now, not everything was rosy. And, with the same honesty that we praise the good, we have to point out what doesn't fit. The **Chicken Empanadas** were the only dish that, honestly, we didn't like one bit. We have to make a *mea culpa* here, and either they take them off the menu or they give the recipe a complete 180-degree turn. They lack the seasoning or the texture we would expect; they feel out of place in a kitchen that otherwise boasts such well-made dishes.

In short, [Restaurant Name] has a lot of potential and dishes that are truly worth trying, especially if you're leaning toward seafood and meat. But please, check out those empanadas! For those of us with an educated palate and who know when something is well done, there are excellent options that demonstrate the talent in this kitchen.
owner_response: ¡Epa, Manuel! 🌟 ¡Gracias por compartir tu experiencia! Nos alegra que disfrutaste del pulpo y el ceviche, ¡son clásicos! Y tomaremos en cuenta tus comentarios sobre las empanadas. ¡Te esperamos de nuevo para seguir probando delicias! 🍽️✨

review_text: Our dining experience was absolutely delightful. Everyone from the hostess to our server, Ethan, and the manager were extremely welcoming. We felt very well taken care of and the food was delicious. Highly recommend this restaurant, and their thoughtfully curated food, drinks, and amazing staff.
owner_response: Thank you so much, Mille! We're thrilled to hear you had a delightful experience and appreciate your kind words about our team and offerings!

review_text:
What a beautiful way to start my week with the lovely Mika behind the bar and great conversation with Jeff and Leidy. Truly a blessing to have met this crew
The guava basil margarita & la duquesa were phenomenal, my favorite was the guava basil Marg
For dinner I had the lobster ravioli*chef's kiss, the portion felt but I enjoyed not being full. I took Mika's recommendation on the banana pudding (she also helped with the drink decision).
I'm only here for work but I'll be coming back each day for a night cap...
If you want to feel like family, come here
owner_response: Hey Kyree! 🎉 We're so glad you had a blast with Mika and enjoyed those yummy drinks! 🍹 Come back anytime for more family vibes and delicious bites! 🌟

review_text: I searched with a colleague for a dinner place and we were more than pleasantly surprised. Fantastic food (gotta try the octupus appetizer, lobster stew appetizer, calamari ink linguini and/or paella), super friendly staff and beautiful atmosphere. A pearl found and will always recommend … including also the cuban coffee.
owner_response:
Dear Peter, 

Thank you for your wonderful review! We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our dishes and appreciated our atmosphere and service. We look forward to welcoming you again for another exceptional dining experience!

review_text: Excelente servicio, la comida deliciosa y un ambiente bien acogedor. Gracias a Elvis y a los chef Jesús y Henry por el buen trato!
review_text_translated: Excellent service, delicious food, and a very welcoming atmosphere. Thanks to Elvis and chefs Jesús and Henry for the warm welcome!
owner_response: Estimada Sharymer, muchas gracias por sus amables palabras. Nos alegra saber que disfrutó de nuestro servicio y ambiente; transmitiré sus elogios a Elvis y a los chefs Jesús y Henry. ¡Esperamos verlo nuevamente pronto!
Thanks, Sorsha! 🎉 You just joined the coolest crew ever! 🕺💖

review_text: Probably one of rhe best little gems in NY.  Great food, great service and atmosphere.
owner_response: Hey J Rivas! 🌟 So glad you discovered our little gem in the city! Can’t wait to see you again for more deliciousness! 🍽️✨

review_text: Buena Vista Restaurant & Bar serves dishes that hit all the right flavor notes. The kitchen matches seemingly opposite tastes. Buena Vista Restaurant & Bar never compromises on quality. The team genuinely made us feel wonderfully at home. Tasty options that don't break the bank; exactly what I wanted.
owner_response: ¡Gracias, Jude! Nos alegra saber que disfrutaste de tu experiencia y apreciamos tu valioso feedback mientras nos esforzamos por mejorar continuamente.

review_text:
The restaurant is in a small space, but the atmosphere, service, drinks and food were all top notch. I recommend making a reservation to ensure that you can be seated when you arrive. From appetizers, to entrees and desserts everything was absolutely delicious. We sampled their bread pudding, flan and tres leches and while you can't go wrong with any of them, the flan stands out above the others.
Will definitely be returning again.
owner_response: Thank you, Jeffrey! We're thrilled to hear you enjoyed everything from our atmosphere to our desserts, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!

review_text: Great service, our waiter was very attentive, had a great personality and made us feel welcome and not rushed. The food was delicious - good portions, tasteful and fresh. The dessert was also made in house and you can taste the freshness. All three were great, but highly recommend the flan.
owner_response: Hey Kat! 🎉 So glad you loved your time with us! The flan is a fan favorite for a reason—thanks for the shoutout! 🍮✨

review_text: Absolutely one of the best meals I’ve had in a while. Ethan’s recommendation for the Duck was spot-on. Service was attentive and  excellent. Highly highly recommend.
owner_response:
Dear Barbiere Family,  
Thank you for your kind words! We're thrilled to hear you enjoyed the duck and the attentive service—your recommendation means a lot to us. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

review_text:
I cannot recommend this place enough! Let’s start with the service:A1. Friendly, attentive, and great recommendations. Our server gave excellent recommendations from drinks to dessert. I ordered the Chilean sea bass and it was amazing! My friends ordered the pork chop and the stuff grilled chicken (it’s stuffed in circular pieces of chicken) and also cleaned their plates like I did. No crumbs left.

The place does have limited seating so would recommend making a reservation if you can BUT may not be needed depending on timing. We came after a show and it wasn’t crowded….at first. If you’re going to see Buena Vista Social Club on Broadway, this is a great complement!
owner_response:
Dear Deena, 

Thank you for your stellar review! We’re thrilled to hear you enjoyed the service, our food recommendations, and the overall dining experience—especially after a fantastic show! We appreciate your advice on reservations, as it helps fellow diners plan their visit. We look forward to welcoming you and your friends back soon!
Thank you, Fabio! We appreciate your positive feedback and are dedicated to continuously enhancing our services for you and all our valued customers.

review_text: Excellent service and food ! Would definitely come back to sample the rest of menu. I had skirt steak which was cooked to perfection and the drinks were made just to our liking.
owner_response: Thank you, Andre! We're thrilled you enjoyed your experience and can't wait to welcome you back to try more of our menu!

review_text: This place does not disappoint. The menu has just enough options but not so many that it is overwhelming. It also means each plate is made of quality and not quantity. The portions are large and the prices are fair. The service is superb. They play you a lot of attention here and make you feel at home and like family.
owner_response: Thank you, Nicole! We're thrilled to hear you enjoyed your experience and appreciate your feedback, which motivates us to keep delivering quality service.

review_text: Food presentation, flavor, ambiance, and customer care was excellent. This is a must try!
owner_response: Thank you, Joseph, for your outstanding review! We’re thrilled to hear you enjoyed our food and service; your recommendation means a lot to us, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!

review_text: Delicious food! Great service! Will come again!
owner_response: Thank you, Eric, for your wonderful feedback! We're thrilled to hear you enjoyed our food and service, and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

review_text:
Excelled food with the staff to match!!
Love going here. Always treated with genuine hospitality that makes me come back everytime!

We had a group dinner here and made reservations. Our table was available upon arrival and we were seated promptly and given water and time to review the wine list. The server was efficient filling our water glasses several times. We all ordered pasta dishes and everyone was pleased with their order. The bread was nice and fresh.
Great service, beef carpaccio I tasted the meat. So many other places it’s sliced too thin where it’s air.

Il locale propone cucina italiana, ma preferisco lasciare agli altri il giudizio sui piatti… 🍝🙂
Quello che voglio invece sottolineare è l’atmosfera della serata: davvero piacevole.
Un ringraziamento speciale ad Antonio, persona fantastica, che porta allegria e rende il tavolo vivo. Se andate, chiedete assolutamente di lui.
review_text_translated:
The restaurant serves Italian cuisine, but I prefer to leave the judgment of the dishes to others... 🍝🙂
What I want to highlight, however, is the atmosphere of the evening: truly pleasant.
A special thanks to Antonio, a fantastic person, who brings joy and brings life to the table. If you go, definitely ask for him.

review_text:
We celebrated my cousin’s milestone birthday at Il Punto. There had to be 20 of us. We all ordered something different. We are “Italian food SNOBS” lol
Yet we were all very pleased!
The food was really good. Service was good as well. However, it is a little loud. Good for dates. :)

Da vera italiano penso che la cucina di questo ristorante sia ancora da migliorare sopratutto in campo di cucina, dove i prodotti non sono il massimo. Ho pure trovato (purtroppo) un pelo nel mio piatto di Calzone alle fragole e crema. Trovo che sia ingiustificabile. Per quanto riguarda il personale l’ho trovato disponibile ma assente nell ambito di simpatia. Avevo alte aspettative e credo le abbia mantenute neutre. Non sarebbe il primo risolto da te che andrei a consigliare ad un amico ma comunque da provare se si vuole assaggiare un briciolo di culture italiana
review_text_translated: As a true Italian, I think this restaurant's cuisine still needs improvement, especially in the kitchen, where the ingredients aren't the best. I also (unfortunately) found my strawberry and cream calzone a little too salty. I find that unjustifiable. As for the staff, I found them helpful but lacking in friendliness. I had high expectations, and I think they kept them neutral. It wouldn't be the first one you've solved that I'd recommend to a friend, but it's definitely worth a try if you want to experience a taste of Italian culture.

review_text:
Todo estuvo excelente, especialmente el servicio de Eladio. Hizo de nuestra experiencia la mejor en NY.

Everything was beyond perfect, special thanks to Eladio who made our experience the very best of them all.
review_text_translated:
Everything was excellent, especially Eladio's service. He made our experience the best in New York.

Everything was beyond perfect, especially thanks to Eladio, who made our experience the very best of them all.

review_text: Authentic Sicilian. Antonio and his team are superlative hosts.

Everything was good. The wine, food and dessert.
Enjoyed our food. I have given 4-star because I have this exact preference for eggplant Parmesan which didn’t match my expectation.
Overall loved everything.!

Ristorante elegante, cibo veramente buono.
I cavatelli alla norma erano ottimi, il tiramisù era fedele a quello originale !!! Consiglio vivamente
review_text_translated:
Elegant restaurant, really good food.
The cavatelli alla norma were excellent, and the tiramisu was faithful to the original! I highly recommend it!

review_text:
Miguel was very welcoming. Good service and and good food. I had the gnocchi al gorgonzola. All the flavors came together nicely. Loved the pears and walnuts with it.

Even better they don’t charge an extra fee for using a credit card! All restaurants should be this way!! This is the main reason why I tried them and I will be back because of this!
Miguel is amazing. First time in NYC and he made me feel right at home.

Truly a gem. Whether you're in town for vacation or business, this place is a must. The food is simply delicious—classics with a special touch that makes each dish stand out. Quality food, amazing service, and ambiance without an ounce of pretentiousness. You must try the Insalata Gelato, lamb chops cooked to perfection, and the sea bass—absolutely delicious. But above all, the absolute must is the pistachio tiramisu dessert: airy, light, and with just the right amount of delicate sweetness.

Every member of the staff makes you feel cared for and welcome. The host and, I believe, co-owner Antonio (I was told he makes the pistachio dessert) is very kind, witty, and welcoming.

Truly a gem in NY!

What a hidden GEM!
Great food, great service. Lovely dining area. Very intimate setting.
We got the calamari and carpaccio to share and both were delicious.
I ordered the Cavatelli with eggplant and my friend got the chicken Parm. Each dish was better than the last. I will be back, whenever I'm in town.
Back again one year later I've been thinking about the Cavatelli alla Norma- it was more delicious than I remember. Orecchiette with sausage was also divine.
This year, I came with my friends and seven month old. The manager was more than accommodating and friendly, kind. Great service again. I'll be back here again and again.

The service was excellent and the food was well-prepared, especially the fresh pasta. I ordered the parpadelle pasta with Bolognese sauce. It is one of my favorite types of pasta and was cooked perfectly. The sauce was rich in flavor with the right ratio of meat. I did try their signature red onion sherbet salad (yes, you read that correctly). The grilled shrimp in the salad was perfectly cooked. The salad was interesting as it is mixed table-side with the sherbet becoming the dressing     It could use a little more acid. And not sure if the blackberries are the right choice of fruit for it. I was warmly greeted as I entered the restaurant and the service was attentive but not obtrusive.

In my opinion the best thing about this Italian restaurant was the very friendly and welcoming staff. They were all helpful and efficient and one was particularly fun. The food was very good so too the atmosphere.
Great little Italian restaurant. A few blocks from the theaters but worth the walk for an after-show cocktail or dinner. Have the Nero Manhattan and the lentil soup.

This excellent spot happens to be right in my new neighborhood. The dishes deliver freshness, flavor, and menu diversity. I can't stop thinking about it! The service approach exceeds normal expectations. This restaurant is ideal for group meals.
Great food and service! Would definitely come back and recommend to anyone looking for authentic Italian food!
Super loud, hard to understand anyone on your table
Professional and friendly service, food created with care and love.
Super bad food.
Best caponata and arancine you can have in NY. Miguel makes some of the best cocktails in town

Un délicieux repas avec une équipe très agréable.
Je recommande +++
review_text_translated:
A delicious meal with a very pleasant team.
I recommend +++

review_text:
La qualità e i sapori della cucina italiana proposti con cortesia e simpatia dall’istrionico proprietario Antonio.
Un angolo di Italia nel cuore di New York
review_text_translated:
The quality and flavors of Italian cuisine offered with courtesy and friendliness by the histrionic owner Antonio.
A corner of Italy in the heart of New York

review_text: On s’est régalé avec une salade caprese 22$, des raviolis maisons 32$, un tiramisu pistache 17$. Le tips est automatique 20%. Accueil et service impeccables.
review_text_translated: We enjoyed a caprese salad for $22, homemade ravioli for $32, and a pistachio tiramisu for $17. The tips are automatic 20%. Impeccable welcome and service.

review_text: Said they closed at 10 on their hours but showed for our reservation at 9:30 and they had locked the doors. Pretty disappointed since a friend had referred the place to us and I was trying to take my parents here. I was very excited but when you don’t honor your reservations it’s a bad look.
I went to have dinner with my mom and the food was amazing!! The place is lovely and the service was exceptional 🤗. We will be going back soon
Very nice small restaurant reasonably priced

It's a nice spot and they are very accommodating. Good for a good size celebration. A little outdated menu, and the food is genuinely good, just not very exited. I don't know if I would name a dish there that I would love to come back for. But I would eat there again if I was in the area.

I was really looking forward to dining here after reading all the positive reviews, but unfortunately, the service left me disappointed.

When I arrived, I was redirected to a hostess stand located quite far from the restaurant itself, where I ended up waiting around ten minutes before being seated — even though the restaurant was basically empty. My server apologized, but it definitely set the tone for the evening.

I ordered a glass of wine and had to ask twice before it finally arrived. Then, when I chose not to order an appetizer, the server seemed frustrated and commented that “the food usually takes longer to cook, so most people get appetizers while they wait.” Ironically, my meal came out very quickly — so that interaction just felt unnecessary and a bit pushy.

The food itself was good, but the overall experience didn’t match the reputation. I left feeling more frustrated than satisfied, which was disappointing since I’d been having such a great night up until then.
Such a great service from Alan! Thank you so much for making amazing drinks! I’ll be definitely back for another experience
owner_response:
Hello Irina,

We're so happy you enjoyed Alan's service and our drinks. We look forward to welcoming you again. For more great spots, check out renwicknyc.com.

Thank you for your kind words.

Miguel Munoz

We’re so glad our Pre-Theater Menu made your trip memorable. If you’re back in NYC, explore our other spots at Renwicknyc.com for more great experiences.

review_text: Кухня вкусная , но вот обслуживание плохое. Если не хотите испортить себе вечер не стоит идти сюда. Одна возрастная женщина , которая много болтает и не может обслужить 5 своих столиков.

Miguel Munoz

review_text:
TLDR: Stylish hotel restaurant with strong drinks and solid small plates. Great if you are staying at Arlo Midtown. Prices run a little high and portions lean smaller.

Arlo Midtown has a clean, modern vibe and the restaurant matches it. We stopped in for small plates and cocktails. The Red Hot Cloud was a standout drink. They pour over cotton candy melts into the drink and tastes as fun as it looks. Other cocktails were well made.

Food was good across the board. The steak came with a bright, herby sauce and was cooked right. The smoked potatoes had a nice heat. The warm dinner roll with whipped butter was an awesome starter. Portions are on the smaller side, so it adds up fast.

Service was friendly and efficient. We were seated quickly and staff knew the menu. If you are staying at Arlo, it is a convenient, enjoyable choice. I would not cross town just for it, but I would happily eat here again while on property.

Pro tips
• Order the Red Hot Cloud cocktail.
• Share two or three plates per person.
• If you want a cheaper meal, there are bodegas and quick bites within a short walk.
owner_response:
Hello GregxPerez,

Thanks for your thoughtful feedback and for highlighting our cocktails and small plates. We appreciate your pro tips and are glad you enjoyed the vibe and service. If you’re ever looking for more great spots, check out our other restaurants and bars at Renwicknyc.com.

Thank you,
Gary Wallach

review_text: Très cool ambiance et délicieuse nourriture, merci beaucoup
